name: Dreamer Act
description:
DREAMER ACT
You get a call from your best friend in the middle of the night.
Your friend wants you to head over to his place right away. On your
way to your friends studio you get the werid feeling you are being followed.
Werid things start to happen to you. Your goal is to try and make it to 
your friends place before something bad happens to you.
CONTROLS:
W,A,S,D to move
ARROW KEYS to move
E and F to interact or enter places 
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TricksterStudi1
